attributes.action: Stop Cancer patients being penalised by not being able to get life/health insurance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Cancer or long term patients are being penalised.  They are unable to get life/health insurance which then means they are unable to obtain mortgages/loans.  

The main clause is "ongoing medical treatment".  This means that unless you don't attend hospital for five years you are eligible for health/life insurance.  Cancer and other long term illnesses do not allow you to be free of hospital appointments.  Therefore patients are penalised.

government_responses.details:
